content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I successfully appended more text to "new_file.txt". I attempted to get hyperlinks from a Wikipedia page using the "google" command, which returned several links. I executed "ls -la" and received a list of files, including "new_file.txt". The "get_hyperlinks" command returned too much output and I was instructed not to execute it again with the same arguments. I successfully executed the "google" command with the query "What is the capital of France?" and received several links. I attempted to replace the word "text" with "word" in "new_file.txt" but received an error that occurrence index 1 is out of range. I successfully appended more text to "new_file.txt". I successfully wrote text to "new_file.txt" and read it, which returned "This is some text that I am writing to the new file."
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "What is the capital of France?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paris", "https://home.adelphi.edu/~ca19535/page%204.html", "https://www.britannica.com/place/France", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_capitals_of_France", "https://www.britannica.com/place/Paris", "https://www.nytimes.com/2013/10/04/t-magazine/marseille-the-secret-capital-of-france.html", "https://www.coe.int/en/web/interculturalcities/paris", "https://www.npr.org/2021/09/25/1039336681/grasse-perfume-france"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -la"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'total 32\\ndrwxrwxr-x 3 1000 rvm  4096 Jun 13 21:41 .\\ndrwxrwxr-x 1 root root   32 Jun 13 21:40 ..\\ndrwxr-xr-x 6 root root   81 Jun 13 19:37 Atlas\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    2 Jun 13 21:40 atlas.json\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm  1859 Jun 13 19:44 atlas.settings.yaml\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm   108 Jun 13 21:40 atlas.yaml\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  301 Jun 13 21:41 file_logger.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  104 Jun 13 21:41 new_file.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  140 Jun 13 21:29 options.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   13 Jun 13 19:45 river.txt\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "text": "This is some text that I am writing to the new file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is some text that I am writing to the new file.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "old_text": "text", "new_text": "word", "occurrence_index": "1"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: Occurrence index 1 is out of range for text in /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/new_file.txt', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "text": "This is some more text that I am appending to the new file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', 'Atlas/misc_files/<filename>', 'Atlas/misc_files/atlas.json']", type='action_result')]
